definition: to indicate the pronunciation of Chinese characters using Pinyin or Bopomofo etc/phonetic notation/(specifically) Bopomofo (abbr. for 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4])
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
see 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4]
Mandarin Phonetic Symbols 1 (official name of the phonetic system of writing Chinese used in Taiwan)/Bopomofo/abbr. to 注音一式[zhu4 yin1 yi1 shi4]
pinyin: Guo2 yu3 zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4 di4 yi1 shi4

definition: Mandarin Phonetic Symbols 1/Bopomofo/abbr. for 國語注音符號第一式|国语注音符号第一式[Guo2 yu3 zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4 di4 yi1 shi4]

sentences.english: Chinese -character Inputting System Usinga New Type of Phonetic Keyboard anda Compound …
sentences.chinese: 使用新式注音鍵盤及複合馬可夫語言模型之中文。

sentences.english: Chinese -character Inputting System Usinga New Type of Phonetic Keyboard anda Compound Markov …
sentences.chinese: 使用新式注音鍵盤及複合馬可夫語言模型之中文。

sentences.english: This Fanqie phonetic, is now "tea" the word pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 這個反切注音，就是現在“茶”字的讀音。

sentences.english: The translation is faithful to the original version, and with emphasis on the rhymes, attached Chinese phonetic symbols.
sentences.chinese: 譯文既忠實原文，又注意韻味，並附有漢語拼音注音。

sentences.english: Chinese phoneme characters can break through the neatness of the phonetic annotation of Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 漢語音素可以突破音素化漢字注音方案的整齊性。

sentences.english: Any beginners in learning is required to learn phonetic symbols first.
sentences.chinese: 凡初學者，必須先學注音符號。

definition: pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
phonetic writing/pinyin (Chinese romanization)
reading/pronunciation (of a Chinese character)
character with two or more readings
reading or phonetic value of a character
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
traditional Chinese character
variant Chinese character
traditional form of Chinese, as opposed to simplified form 簡體|简体[jian3 ti3]
Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
homophonic characters
everyday words
to combine words/word formation
simplified Chinese character, as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fan2 ti3 zi4]
Cantonese romanization/Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems
the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
